aboutme.description1: At 13/14 years old, my desire to explore the internet led me to create blogs and pages on Tumblr. I began studying HTML, CSS, and web design on my own, seeking to customize my pages as beautifully as possible (even without understanding what I was doing haha).
aboutme.description2: At 19, I rediscovered my passion for technology, which led me to enroll in the Bachelor of Computer Science program around mid-2022.
aboutme.job1: Currently, I am interning in Software Development at
aboutme.job2: . Previously, I also interned as a Front-End Developer at
aboutme.job3: . Additionally, I volunteer as a developer and project leader at
aboutme.description3: I consider myself a creative person passionate about what I do. I also enjoy spending time with loved ones, going to the gym, cooking, and gaming. I always strive to balance all areas of my life so that I can dedicate time to everything I love ♡.
